channel.title: Xpatch to editor-patch converter?
channel.description: While putting the finishing touches to a patch and saving it, the axoloti editor crashed.. I was able to save the xpatch file and all other files saved along when going live, but the axp file was severely corrupted (only about 5 lines of code left).. Is there any way to "auto" convert this back into a usable patch-file? Or is my only option having to scroll through the file, searching for the codes of the custom written modules?

item.title: Xpatch to editor-patch converter?
item.dc:creator: @SirSickSik Remco
item.description:
@SirSickSik wrote:

While putting the finishing touches to a patch and saving it, the axoloti editor crashed..
I was able to save the xpatch file and all other files saved along when going live, but the axp file was severely corrupted (only about 5 lines of code left)..
Is there any way to "auto" convert this back into a usable patch-file?
Or is my only option having to scroll through the file, searching for the codes of the custom written modules?

Read full topic
